1/* MPFR internal header related to Static Assertions
2

11option) any later version.
12
13The GNU MPFR Library is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but
14WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY
15or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU Lesser General Public
16License for more details.
17
18You should have received a copy of the GNU Lesser General Public License
19along with the GNU MPFR Library; see the file COPYING.LESSER. If not, see
20http://www.gnu.org/licenses/ or write to the Free Software Foundation, Inc.,
2151 Franklin St, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA 02110-1301, USA. */
22
23#ifndef __MPFR_STATIC_ASSERT_H__
24#define __MPFR_STATIC_ASSERT_H__
25
26#include "mpfr-cvers.h" /* for __MPFR_GNUC */
27
28/* How to use:
29 ===========
30 MPFR_DECL_STATIC_ASSERT:
31 + to check a condition at compile time within the declaration section.
32 MPFR_STAT_STATIC_ASSERT:
33 + to check a condition at compile time within the statement section.
34*/
35
36#ifdef MPFR_USE_STATIC_ASSERT
37
38/* C11 version */
39# if defined (__STDC_VERSION__)
40# if (__STDC_VERSION__ >= 201112L)
41# define MPFR_DECL_STATIC_ASSERT(c) _Static_assert((c), #c )
42# define MPFR_STAT_STATIC_ASSERT(c) _Static_assert((c), #c )
43# endif
44# endif
45
46/* Default version which should be compatible with nearly all compilers */
47# if !defined(MPFR_DECL_STATIC_ASSERT)
48# if __MPFR_GNUC(4,8)
49/* Get rid of annoying warnings "typedef '...' locally defined but not used"
50 (new in GCC 4.8). Thanks to Jonathan Wakely for this solution:
51 https://gcc.gnu.org/ml/gcc-help/2013-07/msg00142.html */
52# define MPFR_TYPEDEF_UNUSED __attribute__ ((unused))
53# else
54# define MPFR_TYPEDEF_UNUSED
55# endif
56# define MPFR_ASSERT_CAT(a,b) MPFR_ASSERT_CAT_(a,b)
57# define MPFR_ASSERT_CAT_(a,b) a ## b
58# define MPFR_STAT_STATIC_ASSERT(c) do { \
59 typedef enum { MPFR_ASSERT_CAT(MPFR_STATIC_ASSERT_CONST_,__LINE__) = !(c) } \
60 MPFR_ASSERT_CAT(MPFR_ASSERT_,__LINE__)[!!(c) ? 1 : -1] \
61 MPFR_TYPEDEF_UNUSED; } while (0)
62# define MPFR_DECL_STATIC_ASSERT(c) \
63 typedef enum { MPFR_ASSERT_CAT(MPFR_STATIC_ASSERT_CONST_,__LINE__) = !(c) } \
64 MPFR_ASSERT_CAT(MPFR_ASSERT_,__LINE__)[!!(c) ? 1 : -1];
65# endif
66
67#else
68
69/* No support: default to classic assertions */
70# define MPFR_DECL_STATIC_ASSERT(c) /* Nothing */
71# define MPFR_STAT_STATIC_ASSERT(c) MPFR_ASSERTN(c)
72
73#endif
74
75#endif
76
